name: Xbox - Compact Friends
description:
I only use the page as a convenient way keep track of my Xbox-friends, and thus - on this page only - I've minimalized it significantly. Mouse-over details still work as before.

If you aren't a U.S. native English-speaker, you may have to change the domain in userstyle code to your friend page accordingly for this to work for you. I apologize for the inconvenience.

As always, do check out my Youtube channel and Steam group. Do add me as a friend, subscribe, or even just leave comments! You can also follow me on twitter.
